name: Mallus Maccius

aspects.trouble: One Discovery Away from Being Caught
other_aspects: Loyal Saboteur for the Right Price

stunts: Master of Sabotage: +2 to Crafts when poisoning or contaminating products
Innocent Face: +2 to Deceive when deflecting suspicion about workplace problems
Pest Handler: +2 to Crafts when breeding or controlling skeevers
notes: Mallus Maccius is an Imperial working at Honningbrew Meadery, but he's secretly Maven Black-Briar's agent. His job is to systematically sabotage the meadery by breeding skeevers in the basement, poisoning mead batches, and ensuring quality problems persist. He presents himself as a loyal, hardworking employee to Sabjorn while undermining the business from within. Maven's goal is to drive Honningbrew into bankruptcy so she can acquire it cheaply. Mallus is methodical, careful, and has been successfully deceiving Sabjorn for months. He's nervous about discovery but confident in his cover. If caught, he'll try to talk his way out or flee to Riften where Maven can protect him.
combat_tactics: Mallus avoids direct combat. If cornered, he'll try to negotiate, bribe, or flee. He might use skeevers as a distraction or weapon of last resort. He carries a small knife but is not a skilled fighter.
social_interaction: Mallus presents as a helpful, dedicated employee. He's deferential to Sabjorn and expresses concern about the meadery's problems while secretly causing them. He's an excellent liar with a talent for deflecting suspicion. When exposed or threatened, his facade drops and he becomes calculating and desperate. He'll offer bribes, threaten with Maven's name, or beg based on what he thinks will work.

relationships.Maven Black-Briar: Secret employer and patron, reports to regularly
relationships.Honningbrew Guards: Maintains friendly cover, deflects their suspicions
relationships.Thieves Guild: May recognize guild members as potential threats or allies depending on situation

personality_notes.speaking_style: Helpful and innocent as cover, calculating and desperate when exposed
motivations: Secure future employment with Black-Briar family
personality_notes.character_growth: None - Mallus is a tool of Maven's ambition and will remain loyal to whoever pays him

story_hooks: Primary antagonist/target in Dampened Spirits quest
Evidence of his sabotage hidden in meadery basement
Can be exposed, killed, bribed, or recruited depending on PC approach
Connection to Maven Black-Briar's larger schemes
May flee to Riften if warned or suspicious

dialogue_samples.cover: I've been working day and night trying to solve these pest problems. Poor Sabjorn is at his wit's end.
dialogue_samples.deflecting: Skeevers? Oh, they must be coming from the walls. Old building, you know. Lots of cracks.
dialogue_samples.when_cornered: Now wait! Let's talk about this. I'm just trying to make a living. Maven pays well - she could pay you too.
dialogue_samples.threatening: You don't want to cross Maven Black-Briar. She owns half of Riften and has friends everywhere.
dialogue_samples.desperate: Please! I'll give you everything Maven paid me! Just let me go and you'll never see me again!

dampened_spirits_context.role: Maven's saboteur destroying Honningbrew from within
dampened_spirits_context.evidence_location: Basement breeding operation and poisoning supplies
exposure_consequences: Bribed to leave or switch sides
Flees to Riften and Maven's protection
dampened_spirits_context.rewards: Maven may pay PC for protecting Mallus or ensuring Honningbrew's failure

maven_connection.payment: 50 gold per week plus bonus for major sabotage
maven_connection.instructions: Keep breeding skeevers, poison random batches, ensure quality stays poor
maven_connection.protection: Maven will shield him if he reaches Riften, but won't risk exposure
maven_connection.betrayal_consequence: If Mallus betrays Maven, she'll send guild members or worse after him
